props.description: The content to be displayed within the banner message. This can include text, icons, or any other ReactNode.
props.title: children

props.description: A function to be called when the user closes the banner. This function is typically used to handle the closing action.
props.title: onClose

props.description: Specifies the visual appearance of the banner message, influencing its color and style.
props.title: appearance

props.description: Determines whether the banner message should float above the content. This can be useful for ensuring the message remains visible even as the user scrolls.
props.title: floating
